title: Fox River Outdoor Wick Dry Alturas Ultra-Lightweight Liner Socks
description: Fox River's patented Wick Dry Health System is designed to help keep feet dry and comfortable, no matter what the temperature.
High-performance socks protect feet against cold or excessive heat and assist the foot's own temperature regulating function.
Fox River uses a combination of natural and synthetic fibers to help keep feet dry and comfortable

These crew liners with Wick Dry technology keep feet dry, avoiding the moisture build up that causes blisters. Sizing: Small (Men's 3-5.5 Women's 4-6.5); Medium (Shoe Sizes: Men's 6-8.5; Women's 7-9.5); Large ( Shoe Sizes: Men's 9-11.5; Women's 10-12.5), X-large( Men's 12-14.5).
